# GVI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`GVI` is a package to calculate a Green Visibility Index (GVI) surface from a DSM, DTM and Greenness Surface. `GVI` is written in C++ to provide a very fast and light weighted functionality.

## Installation

You can install the latest version of `GVI` from GitHub with:

``` r
remotes::install_git("https://github.com/STBrinkmann/GVI")
```
